ValidationRule.description: When Dedicated Rep is same as Sales Rep, show an error message
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( (NOT(ISBLANK(Sales_Rep_Software__c)) && Dedicated_Sales_Rep_Software__c = Sales_Rep_Software__c), (NOT(ISBLANK(Sales_Rep_Hardware_Outside__c)) && Dedicated_Sales_Rep_Hardware__c = Sales_Rep_Hardware_Outside__c) )
/*
OR( (NOT(ISBLANK(Sales_Rep_Software_Inside__c)) && Dedicated_Sales_Rep_Software_Inside__c = Sales_Rep_Software_Inside__c), (NOT(ISBLANK(Sales_Rep_Software__c)) && Dedicated_Sales_Rep_Software__c = Sales_Rep_Software__c), (NOT(ISBLANK(Sales_Rep_Hardware_Outside__c)) && Dedicated_Sales_Rep_Hardware__c = Sales_Rep_Hardware_Outside__c) )
*/
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Dedicated Rep must be different from respective Sales Rep
